ComicInfo.Summary: The malevolent creatures that normally skulk in the shadows of the Underworld grow bolder, and old secrets hint at a violent exodus. The brewing conflict draws Saffire and the Young Olympians to South America. As the Heiress of Olympus, Saffire is plagued by nightmares that tell her Fiendus is coming to unleash his father Hades upon the world. Saffire must confront the Lord of the Underworld in a battle that will determine the fate of both the heavens and the Earth, in this final chapter.
ComicInfo.Title: Hades Gate
